full_description:
DIZO Watch R Talk Go Smart Watch

The DIZO Watch R Talk Go Smart Watch offers clear calling capabilities, low power consumption, stable connection, and noise cancellation algorithms. You can easily manage calls by answering, rejecting, muting, and choosing different notification options for incoming calls. The smartwatch features a big and bright 1.39-inch display with a high resolution of 360x360. The thin 1mm bezel provides a refined operating experience, while the 550nits high brightness ensures clear visibility in various lighting conditions. This smartwatch combines a dynamic aluminum rim with engraved "DIZO" and "Be Different" logos. The sturdy 7H tempered glass and durable aluminum rim protect the watch from scratches, while the soft silicone strap ensures a comfortable fit. The DIZO Watch R Talk Go Smart Watch takes health monitoring seriously with its precise dual health sensors. This device has two sensors instead of the single health sensor found in most smartwatches, which improves the accuracy of fitness monitoring and workout tracking. These sensors deliver accurate information whether you're exercising in the sun, have dark, hairy, or scarred skin. The DIZO Watch R Talk Go provides an impressive amount of battery life due to its low power consumption. With just a 2-hour charging time, you can get up to 10 days of regular use or up to 9 days with calling capabilities. This smartwatch allows you to track your mood, stress levels, and fatigue to monitor your mental health. It also features real-time heart rate monitoring, SpO2 measurement, sleep tracking, menstrual period tracking, step counting, calorie tracking, water intake reminders, and sedentary reminders.

full_description:
DIZO Watch D Smart Watch

The Dizo Watch D is a low-cost wristwatch with a larger 1.8-inch touchscreen and other noteworthy features such as Bluetooth 5.1 connection, more than 110+ sports modes, health-focused trackers, up to 14-days of battery life, notification alerts, and so on. Read the complete specifications of the smartwatch and compare it to its competitors.

Display and Design of the Dizo Watch D

The Dizo Watch D from Realme Techlife has a larger screen than its predecessor. The watch has a 1.8-inch color TFT touchscreen display with thin bezels. In addition, the screen has an HD resolution of 240x286px, a pixel density of 218ppi, and a peak brightness of up to 550 nits. The watch has a layer of curved glass on top that gives it a luxurious appearance. It has a dial with a metallic finish and a tactile button on the side. It also comes with replaceable watch bands in Steel White, Classic Black, Copper Pink, Bronze Green, and Dark Blue. Given the asking price, the watch has a nice design.

Health Benefits

The Dizo Watch D wristwatch includes intriguing capabilities such as the ability to handle incoming calls and audio playing directly from the wrist. Furthermore, the watch alerts for notifications, provide weather updates and has a stopwatch, alarm, and other features. It also has a water-resistant certification for increased durability. The wristwatch has a heart-rate monitor that works around the clock, a SpO2 sensor, a sleep monitor, and a menstrual cycle reminder. It also offers 110+ built-in sports modes such as cycling, walking, jogging, cricket, football, and so on. It also has an activity tracker that accurately identifies exercise specifics, calorie burn, and steps.

Battery and connectivity

The Realme Techlife Dizo Watch D is powered by a 350 mAh Li-Ion battery. According to Dizo, the smartwatch has a battery life of up to 14 days when used normally. Furthermore, the watch comes with a charging dock, and the battery can be fully charged in an hour. The wristwatch has Bluetooth 5.1 connection, which improves signal strength and wireless range. Furthermore, it is compatible with Android and iOS smartphones. The DIZO Watch D Smart Watch comes with a 01-year warranty

full_description:
DIZO DW2001 Watch Smart Watch

The Dizo Watch is a smart wearable gadget created to assist you in keeping track of your fitness and health. With this gadget, you can track all of your activities thanks to 90 Sports Modes, a 3.5 cm (1.4) High-res Touchscreen for simple reading, and up to 12-days of battery life.

3.5 cm (1.4) High-res Touchscreen & 12-day Battery Life

The vivid, high-resolution touchscreen makes it simple to see your stats. Additionally, its brightness of up to 600 nits provides crisp views even in bright circumstances. Thanks to its energy-efficient battery and low-power consumption processor, this wristwatch delivers up to 12 days of battery life on a single full charge and with typical use.

90 Sports Modes, Real-time Heart Rate Monitoring & Blood Oxygen Monitoring

The Dizo Watch With 90 distinct sports modes, this wristwatch enables you to keep track of practically all of your physical activities, from yoga to weight training. To intelligently monitor the wearer's heart rate, this wearable gadget has a cutting-edge PPG sensor. Consequently, it contributes to the provision of information about heart, health, and fitness levels. By keeping an eye on your oxygen levels, you can guarantee that any oxygen shortage is detected as soon as possible before it affects the heart or brain.

IP68-rated Water Resistant

The maximum depth of water resistance for this IP68-rated gadget is 1.5 meters. As a result, you do not need to take the gadget off your wrist to wash your hands or do culinary duties. The DIZO Watch Smartwatch comes with a 06-Month warranty.

full_description:
DIZO Watch Pro Smart Watch

The DIZO Watch Pro is an excellent smartwatch for regular usage, as well as for health and sports. The dial of this watch is square. The dial's body is made of plastic, and it comes with a rubber strap in two colors: black and blue. It has a shiny finish and weighs 40 grams. The Smartwatch features a 1.75-inch 286-PPI display with a resolution of 320 x 385 pixels. While the display quality is adequate, the screen is inappropriate for usage in direct sunlight, and the watch is difficult to use. The vivid and crisp information is enhanced by the bright and colorful display. The DIZO Watch Pro boasts an IP68 classification for water and dust protection, allowing users to use it in severe rain without fear of harm. In terms of health-related functions, the watch has a SpO2 sensor to assess blood oxygen levels, as well as a heart rate sensor, sleep tracker, pedometer, calorie count, and step count with a high degree of accuracy. The watch features more than 90 sports modes, but swimming is not one of them. The DIZO Watch Pro features a 390 mAh battery with 14-day battery life, and it also includes an in-built GPS. The DIZO Watch Pro Smart Watch comes with a 01-year warranty.

The havitDIZO Watch 2 Smartwatch has a 170mAh battery. With it, you can monitor your daily steps, distance, calories, and heart rate. So through this, you can customize your exercise plan.

5ATM Water Resistance

The DIZO Watch 2 Smartwatch is 5ATM water resistance. It indicates that with 500KPA water pressure, 50 meters may be blown over the surface of the water in 30 minutes. Do not press the button when the watch is submerged in water.

Convenient Personalization

The first DIZO product to include a sophisticated DIZO App. In the app, you can simply check your exercise stats or adjust the settings on your watch.

Smart Controls

You may use your watch to control other gadgets or check messages.
